{"id":926287247,"question_id":2723,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680403519,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926287247/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Balanced Substring of a Binary String","memory":"7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findTheLongestBalancedSubstring(string s) {\n        s += 'c';\n        vector<int> sub;\n        char cur = '0';\n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(auto c: s){\n            if(c != cur){\n                sub.push_back(cnt);\n                cnt = 1;\n                cur = c;\n            }else cnt++;\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i: sub) cout << i << ' '; cout << endl;\n        for(int i = 0; i < sub.size() - 1; i+=2){\n            ans = max(ans, min(sub[i], sub[i + 1]));\n        }\n        return ans * 2;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-balanced-substring-of-a-binary-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
